creator: Casual Games Arena
descriptionHtml:
Hexa Puzzle! is an addictive and tricky puzzle game having more than 700 amazing levels with three different shapes HEXA,SQUARE and TRIANGLE.
Look at the blocks and try to see which is the most suitable and make sure that other blocks of the hexa will match depending on the part chosen.
Keep your mind fresh, active and look into all the moves and try to finish all puzzles.
COME AND PLAY COLORFUL GAME

TIPS :
• Use hints when you don't know where to place the block pieces.

HOW TO PLAY
1: No time limit
2: Every block must fit
3: Fill the shape
4: Block Never Rotate
5: Drag the blocks to fit them all in the frame.

GAME FEATURES
1: Addictive Game
2: Very Easy
3: Very Simple
4: Very Tricky
5: Brain Testing
6: Simple Graphics
7: Colorful Shapes
8: Fun and Fresh

Thank you all for downloading the Hexa Block Puzzle!

creator: Casual Games Arena
descriptionHtml:
Description :

This hexagon puzzle will increase your thinking power and productivity. to solve the Hexa blocks. Irregular hexagon blocks will be available.
you have to be managed in a manner that the Hexa block can fit easily in the grid, and go to the next stage of the hexagon puzzle and let's complete it. When you will arranging the block it will enhance your thinking ability that’s mean this hexagon is a mind game also. this hexagon puzzle is a relaxing and challenging game.
This puzzle game is simple like drag and drop
If you feel bored let play hexagon puzzle, its free to download ……!

How to play the Hexa puzzle color game::

Select the mania
Tap on Hexa block and move it to the place where you have to drop it
Arrange the Hexa block until its fit in the grid
You have to arrange it in a manner to level up
If don't have any idea use the hint button to complete the puzzle
No time limits and no moves limit
Hexa boxes not be rotatable

Features::

It's Free to play
Play without internet check
No time limit
Detailed graphics with unique colors
Easy to learn & make the mind sharp
Smooth game-play
Hexa game has more than 1500 levels

creator: Casual Games Arena
descriptionHtml:
If you are a hexa block jigsaw puzzles games fan then come to try this block hexa puzzle games. We are making the addition of block games on Google Play where you will like puzzle and strategy block em all games. This game has different hexa block combination which you can find in popular puzzle blocks. Well this is a real jigsaw game! By playing block puzzles you will learn how to solve hexa block puzzle. You have to drag shapes in hexa games also you will have block triangle to solve in free puzzle game. There a blank spots, just pick puzzle jigsaw and fit it on the right place then you will hexa jigsaw is solved. Complete the rows and columns in hexa jigsaw game and show the world you are the best player of jigsaw puzzle free. Solve every puzzle of jigsaw puzzle offline otherwise you won’t be able to upgrade yourself to the next level of free hexa puzzle. You will have enough pieces to complete the level of merge block puzzle. Jigsaw hexa puzzle have lots of interesting levels where you will stuck how to solve hexa block puzzle games there you will have to give you hundred percent attention then you will find the solution and puzzle will be solved in hexa jigsaw puzzles games.

In Hexa Block Jigsaw Puzzles Games you puzzle skills will matter to complete the test of hexa merge number puzzle. You must play hexa number puzzle game, so we have taken the idea of merge number and making this hexa puzzle game. Unique hexa block puzzle pieces will stretch your brain in match block puzzle hexa game. We are also planning to add some more features like jewels puzzle hexagon game. We are pretty sure when you will start playing this hexa jigsaw you will imagine this as an addictive puzzle game. You will get satisfying while solving puzzle with different pieces in jigsaw puzzle hexa block games.

How to Play Block Jigsaw?

-Arrange Pieces to Fill Hexa
-Hexa Block Can Not Rotate
-Solve Block Jigsaw in Time
-Be Careful When Solving Puzzle Games

Keep you mind sharp and active when playing puzzle games. Analyze different hexa block and solve block puzzle. Try to finish hexa jigsaw in given time and earn points and reward in jigsaw puzzle and hex block games. There are a lot of free levels of puzzle jigsaw and in every level the main task is to solve puzzle hexa. The main jigsaw challenge you will face in jigsaw block to pick the right piece and drop it in the magic jigsaw merge puzzle quest jigsaw game on the right place and complete the level of hexa jigsaw puzzles games.

Features of Hexa Block Jigsaw Puzzles Games

-Easy Game play and Smooth Drag & Drop
-Lots of Challenging Levels of Block Hexa
-Outstanding Graphics of Hexa Puzzles
-Easy to Understand for Every Age Group
-Interesting Levels of Hexa Block Games
